info.skills: What can you do when you reach this level:

levels.textA1: Understand the intonation and gestures of the interlocutor. Be able to say: "London is the capital of Great Britain"
levels.textA2: Talk to children. Listen to English-language music, pretending to understand something.
levels.textB1: Take an English language test to get a job as a front-end developer.
levels.textB2: Use English words in your speech. Where it is necessary and not necessary.
levels.textC1: Mimic under an ordinary resident of the outskirts of Brighton Beach.
levels.textC2: To relax. Because no one knows as many English words as the Queen of Great Britain.
